title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: please if this post is not supposed to be here someone should help me move it. It has been very difficult for me during this period, but thanks be to God for his kindness. I have good news, and the good news is that I have finally bought the solar panel the product is called Home 600 the reason why I bought this was that it's been a challenge for me despite my age I can't always ask someone for something and this has been part of me. willing to invest in Bitcoin but having some challenges.After dripping a thread about my past situation there were several comments and advice so I stocked to one of them, now I am 100% ready to learn about bitcoin through the help of this forum. I got the money I use to buy solar from fishing and my little savings every morning I follow my father to the river to catch fish, most times my father asked me what am I using the money for but he hasn't gotten a good answer, now he finally does. Today my parents and I will always have lights and my father will always listen to the news whenever he's less busy., so no more visiting naibours.

Quiting for visibility.This was fast congratulations on your new achievement indeed this is a very good thing so from now on you won't have to depend on others for power supply. I think this will be the perfect time to go back to your first thread on this forum Somebody should tell me more about Bitcoin trading.You got so many resources that will help you in your journey and since they're no more lack of electricity limiting you again, learning will be very easy for you now but note that's only when you dedicate yourself to it. Once again congratulations.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: It's a good news that you bought a solar for electrification of your home and one of the greatest advantages you could get from this your action is in taking such opportunity to be active on the forum and always have a means to power your login device to bitcointalk since you've decided to learn from the community, now light to power your device shouldn't be a challenge anymore, you can also create enough time in learning more about bitcoin since you're committed to, remain active, learn and ask questions, use the forum search button and read the rules and regulations here to also have an itch free experience.

comments.author: Dickiy
comments.body: Good job you are very fast in responding to the suggestions from people in the forum about your constraints in energy, maybe you will contribute more intensely with the forum and can have time to study the forum. However you seem to be a newbie to this forum so it's important that you review the beginner boards to learn more.You may now be free to analyze and study bitcoin but it looks like you still have limited energy even though you basically have solar panels but that won't be enough if you have bigger electricity dependents, so it's important for you to save the energy you have for now.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: I am glad that you have solved your electricity problem, I bet your family are happy about the development of your goal.Â  Not only you are able to update yourself regularly on Bitcoin and cryptocurrency,Â  your family will now be able to experience a life with electricity.Â  I wonder if that panel is enough to light your house 24/7.Â  Regardless, I believe this is just a starter since you can add more solar panel anytime.Quote from: cafter on March 06, 2023, 07:17:23 PMi would like to suggest you free but best crypto knowledge website ,this website was suggested by someone in this forum so i bookmarked it since then ,there is no ads in this website you can learn everything about crypto and crypto trading crypto fundamentals to blockchain programminghere is the link https://cryptodetail.com/She can also learn the basic of trading and technical analysis through https://www.babypips.com/ though it discuss about Forex but I believe trading has the same fundamentals no matter what kind of asset/currency we are trading

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Congratulations, you've shown that learning Bitcoin has no barriers. Your obstacle was the power supply, which you overcame. Given your empathetic intentions, I think you are capable of accomplishing anything. You can now spend more time on the forum because the power supply problem is resolved. So wait until you have done adequate research before taking any action. Since bitcoin is a highly volatile currency, you should understand everything you can. Just let us know if you run into any problems. We are available to assist you.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Just checked your initial thread and I can totally relate to that situation.Lack of electricity is one of the major issues limiting citizens of developing and under developed Nations and negatively affecting SME growth in those areas.The forum does not count as an enterprise, but one needs to be online to be able to read through and learn. Congratulations on fixing your electricity issue and using an environmentally safe solution.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: You have shown great commitment to learning about bitcoin and you have proved it through your doggedness and hard work. One of the impediments to the spread of Bitcoin adoption in Africa is the lack of power supply. Many African are living without electricity mostly in rural areas. With the problem of power solved, you can now have access to diverse resource materials on bitcoin and hopefully, you will gain profitable knowledge. After you have learned about the coin, you might also save some funds from your fishing business and invest it in bitcoin, you might make some good profit in the nearest future. With your zeal, you can achieve more, congratulations.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: It is meaningful that you saved your money and succeeded in purchasing these solar panels after receiving advice and guidance from the community. I want to tell you that solar energy is economical and environmentally friendly. Now you will not pay any electricity fees, and you can use solar energy to light your house and operate other devices. I hope you are the number of panels what you bought will be enough for this. Still, the most important thing is that you can start your journey in Bitcoin by relying on this beautiful solar energy, which will allow you to operate your computers/Devices to learn and gain experience and start investing and trading in Bitcoin. You can later buy mining equipment; you now have a source Of energy that will not cost you anything; congratulations to you, and I wish you success. My advice is not to rush to invest or trade before you gain experience and take potential risks.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Nice. For how many hours can you run a TV or computer daily with energy generated by this solar panel? Do you have a battery to store energy for longer? It's a first very positive step to have access to this basic element in everyone's lives, and I hope it allows you to open your horizons to even more achievements that must come next.That the spread of solar energy in Africa may help bitcoin adoption to keep growing to even higher levels. Congratulations!

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I know this company, they are a very popular solar company in Nigeria, the Home 600 is a very good package, comes with a Led tv which has a built in decoder, this package cost around $295 to $300.Though this package, I don't think can power computer or be able to power or charge a laptop, but it can efficiently charge and keep the mobile phone on as long as there is constant supply of the sun.A big congratulations mate, if your area is one without electricity, this is definitely a good start as now, you have a good power source to keep your smart phone on for uninterrupted access to this forum.
